data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Chirongui, Mayotte a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chirongui, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Chirongui an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 849 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2 believers in the state of Chirongui the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Chirongui.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Chirongui words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Chirongui, Mayotte.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Chirongui that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chirongui, Mayotte has a population of 1,700.

We estimate Chirongui has 2 people who might know Jesus, 26 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,672 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 849 neighbors who need Jesus.
